name: CL_RELIG_AFFL
description: The CL_RELIG_AFFL table contains information about religious affiliations linked to patient contacts.

columns.name: RELIG_AFFL_ID
columns.description: The unique ID number of the religious affiliation record.

columns.name: RELIG_AFFL_ID_RELIG_AFFIL_NAME
columns.description: The name of the religious affiliation organization.

columns.name: RELIG_AFFIL_NAME
columns.description: The name of the religious affiliation organization.
